chunked_vad.lyrics_text: I got no excuses for all of these goodbyes Call me when it's over, 'cause I'm dying inside Wake me when the shakes are gone And the cold sweats disappear
Call me when it's over, 'cause I'm dying inside Wake me when the shakes are gone And the cold sweats disappear Call me when it's over and myself has reappeared
Wake me when the shakes are gone And the cold sweats disappear Call me when it's over and myself has reappeared I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't know why
And the cold sweats disappear Call me when it's over and myself has reappeared I don't know, I don't know, I don't know, I don't know why I do it every, every, every time
